Name: Requires callers to provide their name and contact information when making a report of suspected child abuse or maltreatment to the New York Statewide Central Register of Child Abuse and Maltreatment (A.66A/S.550A).
Title: Resolution calling on the Governor to sign A.66A/S.550A, which requires callers to provide their name and contact information when making a report of suspected child abuse or maltreatment to the New York Statewide Central Register of Child Abuse and Maltreatment

History.Description: This Resolution was Introduced by Council
This Resolution was Referred to Comm by Council to the Committee on Children and Youth
